          <title>
            <string language="en">Balloon inside a beaker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballon innerhalb eines Bechers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon à l'intérieur d'un becher</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two balloons each in a beaker of cold and hot water.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre deux ballons chacun 
dans un becher d'eau froide et chaude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra dois balões cada um em 
uma taça da água fria e quente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra due aerostati ciascuno
in una coppa di acqua calda fredda e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σε δύο μπαλόνια κάθε 
μιας σε μια κούπα του κρύου και καυτού ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra dos globos cada uno en 
un cubilete de agua fría y caliente.</string>
